title: The Importance of Singleness with Meredith Foster
description:
Oh singleness... isn't it fun? In today's episode, Jeanine and Meredith discuss why they are single, why singleness is so important, and they open up about their dating pasts. We hope today's episode helps you embrace your single season, verses looking at it negatively, while you're waiting to meet the right person! New episode every Tuesday!

Meredith Foster - https://www.instagram.com/meredithfoster/

Her Podcast - https://open.spotify.com/episode/53yEoYJRaVyxZoQAoPoDvZ?si=RRhtkc2XRl2rYXYEVzkzSA 

Follow My Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/jeanineamapola/

Follow the Happy & Healthy Podcast and leave me suggestions there! - https://www.instagram.com/happyandhealthypodcast/
